title: Family of Palestinian-American man killed in West Bank demand accountability
summary_full: Nasrallah Abu Siyam was the sixth American citizen killed by Israeli settlers or soldiers in the West Bank in the last two years.
summary_public: Nasrallah Abu Siyam was the sixth American citizen killed by Israeli settlers or soldiers in the West Bank in the last two years.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: killed by Israeli settlers or soldiers in the West Bank
